nodes.text: The Red Fury Brotherhood were a group of pirates that signed terms with Count Dooku, leader of the Confederacy of Independent Systems, to exclusively target the Galactic Republic during the Clone Wars.

The Red Fury Brotherhood were first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019. They were originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where they first appeared in the 1986 comic book Droids 3, which was written by David Manak and illustrated by John Romita. The group were first named in Legends in the Living Force Campaign Guide, a supplement to Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game written by Robert Wiese.
